vlive.korean: 여러분들 감정 소모라고 하죠? Um... You know the expression emotional exhaustion? 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #밤황치열시 #part.5 #DJ황치열

vlive.korean: 생각보다 체력 소모가 좀 되는 춤인 거 같아요. The dance takes more out of you than I thought it would. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] L.O.Λ.E RECORD B-Side EP.09
vlive.english: The dance takes more out of you than I thought it would.

vlive.korean: 칼로리 소모 시간 때 이것도 저랑 언니랑 듀엣 곡이었습니다. During calorie burning time, this song was our duet song. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 은서엑시의 랜덤댄스 (HOW TO DANCE WJSN’s Random dance)
vlive.english: During calorie burning time, this song was our duet song.

vlive.korean: 이거 칼로리 소모 시간 때 이것도 저랑 언니랑 듀엣 곡이었습니다. We did a duet to this song when we tried to burn calories. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [은서] 은서의 랜덤게임 🐶💃🎮 Ep.02
vlive.english: We did a duet to this song when we tried to burn calories.

vlive.korean: 그 적정 온도까지 낮추는데 전력소모를 더 많이하게 된대요. In order to cool it down to that temperature, it uses that much more energy. 듣기 View video INFINITE : INFINITE "김명수의 TALK N TALK"
vlive.english: In order to cool it down to that temperature, it uses that much more energy.

examples.korean: Some people burn calories faster than others. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어떤 사람들은 다른 사람들보다 칼로리를 더 빨리 소모시킨다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some people burn calories faster than others. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Which burns up more calories—swimming or cycling? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 수영과 자전거 타기 중 어느 것이 칼로리 소모가 더 큰가요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Which burns up more calories—swimming or cycling? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The electricity industry consumes large amounts of fossil fuels. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전기 산업은 많은 양의 화석 연료를 소모한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The electricity industry consumes large amounts of fossil fuels. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This study represents a major expenditure of time and effort. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 연구는 대단한 시간과 노력 소모를 의미한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This study represents a major expenditure of time and effort. Add to Wordbook
